name: MIAW MCP Server
description: MCP Server for Salesforce Enhanced Chat (MIAW) API - enables AI agents to interact with Salesforce messaging

MIAW_SCRT_URL.description: Your Salesforce SCRT URL (without https://). Example: mycompany.salesforce-scrt.com

MIAW_ORG_ID.description: Your Salesforce Organization ID (15 characters). Find in Setup > Company Information

MIAW_ES_DEVELOPER_NAME.description: Enhanced Chat Deployment Developer Name (API Name). Find in Setup > Embedded Service Deployments
